item.title: [Rental] Fender Telecaster Electric Guitar
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Iconic solid-body electric guitar known for its timeless design and versatile tone.
item.content:encoded:
The Fender Telecaster is a legendary instrument celebrated for its simplicity, durability, and unmistakable sound. With its solid ash or alder body, bolt-on maple neck, and single-coil pickups, the Telecaster delivers a distinctive twangy tone that’s been heard on countless recordings across various genres. Whether you’re playing country, rock, blues, or beyond, the Telecaster offers timeless style and unmatched playability.

  • Body: Alder
  • Maple neck
  • Fretboard: Maple
  • Matte neck finish
  • 22 Frets
  • Nut width: 42 mm
  • Scale: 648 mm
  • Pickups: 2 New Player AlNiCo V single coils
  • Volume knob and tone knob
  • 3-Way toggle switch
  • Standard sealed machine heads
  • Ex-factory stringing: Fender .009 – .042
  • Colour: Tidepool

item.title: Gretsch G5420T Electromatic Hollow Body Electric Guitar
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Classic hollow-body electric guitar with vintage-inspired tone and style.
item.content:encoded:
The Gretsch G5420T Electromatic hollow-body electric guitar captures the essence of Gretsch’s iconic sound and style. Featuring a laminated maple body, dual “Black Top” Filter’Tron pickups, and a Bigsby vibrato tailpiece, this guitar delivers rich, resonant tone with classic Gretsch twang and shimmer. With its elegant design, smooth playability, and versatile sound, the G5420T is perfect for players seeking vintage-inspired tone and aesthetics.

  • Construction: Hollowbody with single cut
  • Body: Maple laminated with trestle block
  • Body depth: 70 mm (2.75″)
  • Maple neck
  • Laurel fretboard
  • Pearloid Neo-Classic thumbnail fretboard inlays
  • Neck profile: Classic “C”
  • Nut width: 42.86 mm (1.6875″)
  • Graph Tech NuBone nut
  • 22 Medium jumbo frets
  • Pickup: 2x FT-5E FilterTron humbuckers
  • Volume control for neck pickup
  • Volume control for bridge pickup
  • Master volume control with treble bleed
  • Master tone control
  • Silver plexiglass pickguard with black Gretsch and Electromatic logos
  • Adjusto-Matic bridge with secured Laurel base
  • Bigsby B60
  • Open vintage style tuners
  • Nickel hardware
  • String gauge ex-works: .011 – .049
  • Colour: Orange Stain

item.title: Fender Telecaster Electric Guitar
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Iconic solid-body electric guitar known for its timeless design and versatile tone.
item.content:encoded:
The Fender Telecaster is a legendary instrument celebrated for its simplicity, durability, and unmistakable sound. With its solid ash or alder body, bolt-on maple neck, and single-coil pickups, the Telecaster delivers a distinctive twangy tone that’s been heard on countless recordings across various genres. Whether you’re playing country, rock, blues, or beyond, the Telecaster offers timeless style and unmatched playability.

  • Body: Alder
  • Maple neck
  • Fretboard: Maple
  • Matte neck finish
  • 22 Frets
  • Nut width: 42 mm

  • Pickups: 2 New Player AlNiCo V single coils

item.title: Epiphone Les Paul Standard Electric Guitar
item.dc:creator: Marius Kieldsen
item.description: Classic design. Affordable quality. The Epiphone Les Paul Standard offers the iconic look and sound of the original at a fraction of the price, making it accessible to musicians of all levels.
item.content:encoded:
Get ready to rock with the Epiphone Les Paul Standard Electric Guitar. Inspired by the iconic Gibson original, this affordable instrument delivers classic Les Paul tone and style at a fraction of the price. The mahogany body and maple top provide a warm, resonant tone with plenty of sustain, while the SlimTaper “D” profile neck offers smooth playability and effortless access to all 22 frets. Equipped with a pair of Alnico Classic humbucking pickups, the Les Paul Standard delivers rich, full-bodied tones with plenty of bite and sustain, making it perfect for everything from blues and rock to metal and beyond. With its timeless design, legendary sound, and unbeatable value, the Epiphone Les Paul Standard is the perfect choice for players of all styles and skill levels.

  • Limited edition
  • Top: flamed maple
  • Body: Mahogany
  • Neck: Mahogany
  • Fingerboard: Indian laurel
  • Long neck tenon
  • New Kalamazoo headstock
  • Scale: 628 mm
  • Nut width: 42 mm
  • Neck profile: 50s Vintage
  • 22 Frets
  • Pickup: 2 Gibson Burstbucker humbucker
  • 2 x Volume and 2 x tone controls
  • 3-Way toggle switch
  • ’50s wiring with CTS potentiometers and Mallory capacitors
  • Epiphone LockTone ABR-1 bridge with stopbar tailpiece
  • Kluson-style machine heads
  • Colour: Aged Dark Burst
  • Incl. vintage-style case

item.title: Gibson SG Standard Electric Guitar
item.dc:creator: Marius Kieldsen
item.description: Sleek style. Aggressive tone. The Gibson SG Standard is a rock icon known for its devilish looks and powerful sound, favored by players seeking raw energy and playability.
item.content:encoded:
Prepare to rock out in style with the Gibson SG Standard Electric Guitar. Boasting a sleek, double-cutaway design and iconic sound, the SG Standard is a favorite among guitarists seeking a powerful, no-nonsense instrument. The mahogany body and neck provide a warm, resonant tone with plenty of sustain, while the slim-tapered neck profile offers fast, comfortable playability. Equipped with a pair of high-output humbucking pickups, the SG Standard delivers thick, crunchy tones with plenty of bite and aggression, making it perfect for everything from classic rock to heavy metal. With its timeless design, legendary tone, and uncompromising quality, the Gibson SG Standard is sure to inspire you to new heights of musical creativity.

  • Body: Mahogany
  • Neck: Mahogany
  • Fretboard: Rosewood (Dalbergia latifolia)
  • Neck profile: Slim Taper
  • Graphtech nut
  • Nut width: 43 mm
  • Scale: 628 mm
  • 22 Cold-treated medium frets
  • Trapeze fretboard inlays
  • Cream fretboard binding
  • ABR-1 Tuneomatic bridge
  • Pickups: Burstbucker 61R (neck) and 61T (bridge) humbuckers
  • 2 Volume and 2 tone controls
  • Vintage deluxe machine heads
  • Colour: Heritage Cherry
  • Includes case
  • Made in USA

item.title: Gibson Les Paul Standard Electric Guitar
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Timeless tone. Legendary playability. The Gibson Les Paul Standard is a rock icon, delivering powerful sound and unparalleled craftsmanship.
item.content:encoded:
Prepare to be mesmerized by the legendary tone and craftsmanship of the Gibson Les Paul Standard Electric Guitar. Boasting a mahogany body topped with a carved maple cap, this iconic instrument delivers a rich, resonant sound with plenty of sustain and warmth. The slim-tapered mahogany neck offers effortless playability, while the rosewood fingerboard provides a smooth and comfortable feel. Equipped with Burstbucker Pro pickups, the Les Paul Standard produces a powerful and articulate sound that cuts through any mix with ease. With its classic looks, timeless tone, and impeccable build quality, the Gibson Les Paul Standard is a true masterpiece that has stood the test of time.

  • Slash signature model
  • Body: Mahogany (Swietenia macrophylla – Origin: India/ Indonesia)
  • Top: AAA flamed maple
  • Neck: Mahogany (Swietenia macrophylla – Origin: India/ Indonesia)
  • Fretboard: Rosewood (Dalbergia Latifolia)
  • Neck profile: Thick
  • Scale: 628 mm
  • Nut width: 43 mm
  • Tektoid nut
  • 22 Frets
  • Pickups: 2x Custom Burstbucker Alnico II double black
  • ABR bridge
  • Aluminium stop bar
  • Colour: November Burst
  • Case, accessory kit and Slash picks set included
  • Made in USA

item.title: Fender Stratocaster Electric Guitar
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Iconic design. Classic sound. The Fender Stratocaster is a legend in the world of electric guitars, loved by musicians for its versatility and sleek style.
item.content:encoded:
The Fender Stratocaster Electric Guitar stands as a testament to timeless design and unparalleled performance. Crafted with precision and attention to detail, this iconic instrument boasts a solid alder body, providing a rich, resonant tone with excellent sustain. The maple neck with a modern “C” shape profile ensures comfortable playability, while the 22 medium jumbo frets offer smooth fretting and bending. Equipped with three single-coil pickups, the Stratocaster delivers a versatile range of tones, from sparkling cleans to gritty overdrives, making it a staple in any guitarist’s collection. With its classic double-cutaway design and legendary vibrato system, the Fender Stratocaster continues to inspire musicians across generations.

  • Alder body
  • Maple neck
  • Pau Ferro fretboard
  • Matte neck finish
  • 22 Frets
  • Scale: 648 mm
  • Nut width: 42 mm
  • Pickups: 2 New Player AlNiCo II humbuckers (bridge and neck) and 1 New Player AlNiCo V single coil (middle)
  • Volume, tone (neck and middle) and tone (bridge) controls
  • 5-Way switch
  • 2-Point tremolo
  • Standard sealed machine heads
  • Factory stringing: Fender .009 – .042 (Article number 133191)
  • Colour: Tobacco Burst
